name: Curve Fever Pro
description: Curve Fever Pro is the newest successor of Achtung, die Kurve. Curve Fever Pro is a free to play, online multiplayer game where you compete against 1 to 5 other players, trying to survive the longest and steal points from them. You have your ship on which you get 2 open slots to equip with abilities from a variety of 27 different powers. To equip a power you just have to drag and drop it to the prefered slot – top one for up arrow/ W key and the bottom one for down arrow/ S key.
